propel.core.collections.maps
Interface ISharedHashtable<TKey extends java.lang.Comparable<TKey>,TValue>

All Superinterfaces:
IShared, java.lang.Iterable<KeyValuePair<TKey,TValue>>, ReifiedMap<TKey,TValue>
All Known Implementing Classes:
SharedAvlHashtable
public interface ISharedHashtable<TKey extends java.lang.Comparable<TKey>,TValue>
extends ReifiedMap<TKey,TValue>, IShared

The interface of a thread-safe hashtable

Method Detail

add

boolean add(TKey key,
            TValue value)
Adds a new key/value pair. Returns true if successful, false if another object with same key exists.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the key is null.

addRange

java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Boolean> addRange(java.lang.Iterable<? extends TKey> keys,
                                               java.lang.Iterable<? extends TValue> values)
Bulk add key/value pairs to avoid locking/unlocking continuously. Returns true for elements that were successfully added, false for those that were not. You are advised not to use null keys, as these are not allowed and failing will leave the collection in an inconsistent state.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the keys or the values argument is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the keys and values collections do not have the same size.

clear

void clear()
Removes all keys and values.

contains

boolean contains(TKey key)
Returns the value of a key, if found. Otherwise a null value is returned.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the key is null.

get

TValue get(TKey key)
Returns the key's value if it exists, otherwise throws KeyNotFoundException.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the key is null.
KeyNotFoundException - When the key was not found.

get

TValue get(TKey key,
           TValue nullValue)
Returns the value of a key, if found. Otherwise the specified nullValue is returned.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the key is null.

getKeys

ReifiedIterable<TKey> getKeys()
Returns a copy of all keys

getValues

ReifiedIterable<TValue> getValues()
Returns a copy of all values

remove

boolean remove(TKey key)
Removes a value by its key. Returns true if successfully done, false if no such key.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the key is null.

removeAndGet

TValue removeAndGet(TKey key,
                    TValue nullValue)
Removes a value by its key and returns it. If no such key, null is returned.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the key is null.

removeRange

java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Boolean> removeRange(java.lang.Iterable<? extends TKey> keys)
Removes a number of elements by key. Returns true for those successfully removed, false for those that there was no such key. You are advised not to use null keys, as these are not allowed and failing will leave the collection in an inconsistent state.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the keys is null.

replace

boolean replace(TKey key,
                TValue newValue)
Replaces a key's value, returning true if this was successful.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the key is null.

replaceAll

java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Boolean> replaceAll(java.lang.Iterable<? extends TKey> keys,
                                                 java.lang.Iterable<? extends TValue> values)
Clears the hashtable and bulk adds key/value pairs to avoid locking/unlocking continuously. Returns true for elements that were successfully added, false for those that were not. You are advised not to use null keys, as these are not allowed and failing will leave the collection in an inconsistent state.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - When the keys or the values argument is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the keys and values collections do not have the same size.

size

int size()
Returns size of hashtable

Specified by:
size in interface ReifiedMap<TKey extends java.lang.Comparable<TKey>,TValue>
